name: Vizabi
description: Social project to hire women in tech. A company can solve its diversity problem quickly by hiring the teams of female junior developers paired with a senior developer mentor.
solutions: Created the architecture sctructure of the tool
Updated visualization tools and BigData sets
outcome: BigData is a visualization tool that could be embedded in custom solutions to create new visualizations for users' needs.

Technology stack: AWS (EC2, ECR, ECS, ElasticCache, CloudFormation) to GCP migration
